mapper.select:
SELECT A.CUID,A.PNSID, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_PUSH_COMPLETE B WHERE SEQNO =#{SEQNO} AND CUID = #{CUID} AND PNSID=A.PNSID AND RECEIVEACK = 'R') > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS READ_YN,
CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_PUSH_COMPLETE B WHERE SEQNO = #{SEQNO} AND CUID = #{CUID} AND PNSID=A.PNSID AND RECEIVEACK = 'R') > 0 THEN TO_CHAR((SELECT REGDATE FROM T_PUSH_COMPLETE B WHERE SEQNO = #{SEQNO} AND CUID = #{CUID} AND PNSID=A.PNSID AND RECEIVEACK = 'R'), 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') END AS READDATE,
CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_PUSH_COMPLETE B WHERE SEQNO = #{SEQNO} AND CUID = #{CUID} AND PNSID=A.PNSID AND RECEIVEACK = 'S') > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS SEND_YN,
CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_PUSH_COMPLETE B WHERE SEQNO =#{SEQNO} AND CUID = #{CUID} AND PNSID=A.PNSID AND RECEIVEACK = 'S') > 0 THEN TO_CHAR((SELECT REGDATE FROM T_PUSH_COMPLETE B WHERE SEQNO = #{SEQNO} AND CUID = #{CUID} AND PNSID=A.PNSID AND RECEIVEACK = 'S'), 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') END AS SENDDATE
FROM ( SELECT CUID,PNSID from T_PUSH_COMPLETE where SEQNO=#{SEQNO} and CUID= #{CUID} group by CUID,PNSID ) A
